ALG-GalacticGod.name: Galactic God
ALG-GalacticGod.description: Evolve a creature from cell to intergalactic space traveler in one continuous game.

ALG-Photographer.name: Photographer
ALG-Photographer.description: Send a photo or video to a friend from the Test Drive mode.

ALG-SporeFan.name: Spore Fan
ALG-SporeFan.description: Spend 50 hours in your Spore galaxy.

ALG-Spore Addict.name: Spore Addict
ALG-Spore Addict.description: Spend 100 hours in your Spore galaxy.

ALG-Creator.name: Creator
ALG-Creator.description: Spend more than 50 hours in the Creators.

ALG-UniverseInABox.name: Universe in a Box
ALG-UniverseInABox.description: Play every game level and use every creator at least once.

ALG-DejaVu.name: Déjà Vu
ALG-DejaVu.description: Stumble across one of your own creations when exploring the universe.

ALG-SocialEngineer.name: Social Engineer
ALG-SocialEngineer.description: Make 5 Sporecasts of 50 assets or more.

ALG-RisingStar.name: Rising Star
ALG-RisingStar.description: Have 5 different Sporecasts subscribed to by at least 10 different people.

ALG-FrontPageNews.name: Front Page News
ALG-FrontPageNews.description: Have one of your creations or Sporecasts featured on the Spore website.

alg-aluminumcell.name: Aluminum Cell
alg-aluminumcell.description: Complete Cell stage on Hard setting.

alg-ironcreature.name: Iron Creature
alg-ironcreature.description: Complete Creature stage on Hard setting.

alg-Steel Tribe.name: Steel Tribe
alg-Steel Tribe.description: Complete Tribe stage on Hard setting.

alg-TitaniumCivilization.name: Adamantium Civilization
alg-TitaniumCivilization.description: Complete Civilization stage on Hard setting.

clg-landfall.name: Landfall
clg-landfall.description: Finish the Cell stage and clamber onto the planet's surface!

clg-pacifist.name: Pacifist
clg-pacifist.description: Finish the Cell stage without killing another creature.

clg-completist.name: Completist
clg-completist.description: Unlock all the parts in Cell stage.

clg-speedfreak.name: Speedfreak
clg-speedfreak.description: Finish the Cell stage in under 8 minutes.

ALG-UnlockCreature.name: Creature Stage Unlocked
ALG-UnlockCreature.description: Play enough of the Cell stage to unlock the Creature stage.

Friend.name: Everyone's BFF
Friend.description: Finish the Creature stage by befriending at least 20 other species.

CRG-Genocider.name: Foe
CRG-Genocider.description: Extinct at least 20 other species in Creature stage.

Max Power.name: Max Power
Max Power.description: Build a creature with max stats in at least four abilities while playing the Creature stage.

Immortal.name: Survivor
Immortal.description: Complete the Creature stage without dying.

Creature Socialite.name: Socialite
Creature Socialite.description: Meet 200 creatures made by other players.

Flight of the Bumblebee.name: Flight of the Bumblebee
Flight of the Bumblebee.description: Fly for over 200 meters without touching the ground.

CRG-Devourer.name: Devourer
CRG-Devourer.description: Eat 50 different species across any number of games.

Village People.name: Village Folks
Village People.description: Have three posse members from different species.

CRG-SpeedDemon.name: Speed Demon
CRG-SpeedDemon.description: Complete the Creature stage in less than an hour.

CRG-EpicKiller.name: Epic Killer
CRG-EpicKiller.description: Kill an Epic Creature in the Creature stage.

ALG-UnlockTribe.name: Tribe Stage Unlocked
ALG-UnlockTribe.description: Play enough of the Creature stage to unlock the Tribe stage.

Founder.name: Founder
Founder.description: Complete the Tribal stage and build a city.

Tribal Socialite.name: Tribal Socialite
Tribal Socialite.description: Convert all 5 other tribes to your belief system.

Vicious.name: Vicious
Vicious.description: Kill all members of all 5 other tribes and raze their villages.

Domestic Bliss.name: Domestic Bliss
Domestic Bliss.description: Domesticate and farm three different species.

Watchful Parent.name: Watchful Parent
Watchful Parent.description: Complete the Tribal stage without the death of a single tribe member.

The Horde.name: Ergonomically Terrific
The Horde.description: Complete the Tribal stage in less than an hour.

ALG-UnlockCiv.name: Civilization Stage Unlocked
ALG-UnlockCiv.description: Play enough of the Tribe stage to unlock the Civilization stage.

CVG-Starman.name: Starman
CVG-Starman.description: Conquer all the other cities in the Civilization stage and launch your first space vessel.

CVG-Economist.name: Economist
CVG-Economist.description: Finish the Civilization stage with more than 8 economic cities.

CVG-MilitaryStrongman.name: Military Strongman
CVG-MilitaryStrongman.description: Finish the Civilization stage with more than 8 military cities.

CVG-Missionary.name: Missionary
CVG-Missionary.description: Finish the Civilization stage with more than 8 religious cities.

CVG-SpiceHorder.name: Spice Hoarder
CVG-SpiceHorder.description: Control every spice node on the planet simultaneously.

CvG-RollingThunder.name: Rolling Thunder
CvG-RollingThunder.description: Complete the Civilization stage in less than an hour.

ALG-UnlockSpace.name: Space Stage Unlocked
ALG-UnlockSpace.description: Play enough of the Civilization stage to unlock the Space stage.

SPG-SuperPilot.name: Super Pilot
SPG-SuperPilot.description: Spend at least 40 hours piloting your spaceship.

SPG-BioEng.name: Bio Engineer
SPG-BioEng.description: Edit 25 creatures with the Creature Tweaker.

SPG-PalmGreaser.name: Palm Greaser
SPG-PalmGreaser.description: Pay 50 bribes in the Space stage.

SPG-EagleScout.name: Maxis Scout
SPG-EagleScout.description: Earn 100 badges in the Space stage.

SPG-QuestMaster.name: Quest Master
SPG-QuestMaster.description: Complete 150 missions in the Space stage.

SPG-IdentityCrisis.name: Identity Crisis
SPG-IdentityCrisis.description: Forge an alliance between two space faring races of your own creation.

SPG-Thief.name: Thief
SPG-Thief.description: Steal 50 crates of spice in the Space stage.

SPG-42.description: Find the Center of the Galaxy.

SPG-Alter Ego's Alter Ego.name: Alter Ego's Alter Ego
SPG-Alter Ego's Alter Ego.description: Achieve Master Badge Level 10 as all archetypes.

Zealot Hero.name: Zealot Hero
Zealot Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Zealot.

Warrior Hero.name: Warrior Hero
Warrior Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Warrior.

Bard Hero.name: Bard Hero
Bard Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Bard.

Knight Hero.name: Knight Hero
Knight Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Knight.

Wanderer Hero.name: Wanderer Hero
Wanderer Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Wanderer.

Trader Hero.name: Trader Hero
Trader Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Trader.

Shaman Hero.name: Shaman Hero
Shaman Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Shaman.

Scientist Hero.name: Scientist Hero
Scientist Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Scientist.

Diplomat Hero.name: Diplomat Hero
Diplomat Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Diplomat.

Ecologist Hero.name: Ecologist Hero
Ecologist Hero.description: Achieved Master Badge Level 10 as Ecologist.

ADV-GrandAdventurer.name: Grand Adventurer
ADV-GrandAdventurer.description: Complete 100 Adventures inside the Space Stage.

ADV-Mercenary.name: Mercenary
ADV-Mercenary.description: Kill 1000 creatures while playing Adventures in Space Game.

ADV-Dragon Slayer.name: Dragon Slayer
ADV-Dragon Slayer.description: Kill 1000 epics while playing Adventures in Space Game.

ADV-SocialButterfly.name: Social Butterfly
ADV-SocialButterfly.description: Befriend 1000 creatures while playing Adventures in Space Game.

ADV-My Precious.name: My Precious
ADV-My Precious.description: Collect 3000 items while playing Adventures in Space Game.

ADV-Major Contributor.name: Major Contributor
ADV-Major Contributor.description: Give 500 gifts while playing Adventures in Space Game.

ADV-RedShirt.name: Red Shirt
ADV-RedShirt.description: Lose 100 crew members while playing Adventures in Space Game.

ADV-My Hero.name: My Hero
ADV-My Hero.description: Defend 500 creatures while playing Adventures in Space Game.

ADV-DemolitionExpert.name: Demolition Expert
ADV-DemolitionExpert.description: Destroy 1000 buildings while playing Adventures in Space Game.

ADV-Auto-Wrecker.name: Auto-Wrecker
ADV-Auto-Wrecker.description: Destroy 1000 vehicles while playing Adventures in Space Game.

ADV-Consumer.name: Consumer
ADV-Consumer.description: Complete 200 missions made by other players.

ADV-Costume Piece.name: Costume Piece
ADV-Costume Piece.description: Create 50 adventures with tribal, civilazation, and space actors.

ADV-Delirious Designer.name: Delirious Designer
ADV-Delirious Designer.description: Create 50 adventures using only your creations.

ADV-Terraformer.name: Terraformaniac
ADV-Terraformer.description: Create 50 adventures on planets that you terraformed.

ADV-Scientist.name: Scientist
ADV-Scientist.description: Place 200 non-accessorised creatures into your adventures.

ADV-Going Tribal.name: Going Tribal
ADV-Going Tribal.description: Place 200 Tribal Creatures into your Adventures.

ADV-So Civilized.name: So Civilized
ADV-So Civilized.description: Place 200 Civilization Creatures into your Adventures.

ADV-Emperor.name: Emperor
ADV-Emperor.description: Place 200 Empire Creatures into your Adventures.

ADV-Happy Times.name: Happy Times
ADV-Happy Times.description: Create 30 Adventures with all peaceful actors.

ADV-Granddaddy.name: Granddaddy
ADV-Granddaddy.description: Create an Adventure that is edited by 10 other players.

ADV-Bestseller.name: Bestseller
ADV-Bestseller.description: Have one of your creations or Sporecasts featured on the Spore website.

ADV-FierceWarrior.name: Fierce Warrior
ADV-FierceWarrior.description: Unlock all four Warrior parts on a Captain.

ADV-IntelligentScientist.name: Intelligent Scientist
ADV-IntelligentScientist.description: Unlock all four Scientist parts on a Captain.

ADV-IndustriousTrader.name: Industrious Trader
ADV-IndustriousTrader.description: Unlock all four Trader parts on a Captain.

ADV-JoyfulBard.name: Joyful Bard
ADV-JoyfulBard.description: Unlock all four Bard parts on a Captain.

ADV-FaithfulZealot.name: Faithful Zealot
ADV-FaithfulZealot.description: Unlock all four Zealot parts on a Captain.

ADV-WiseShaman.name: Wise Shaman
ADV-WiseShaman.description: Unlock all four Shaman parts on a Captain.

ADV-JustDiplomat.name: Just Diplomat
ADV-JustDiplomat.description: Unlock all four Diplomat parts on a Captain.

ADV-UniversalEcologist.name: Universal Ecologist
ADV-UniversalEcologist.description: Unlock all four Ecologist parts on a Captain.

ALG-PurpleHeart.name: Can't Win For Losing
ALG-PurpleHeart.description: Die at least once in every stage of Spore.

alg-cheater.name: Pathological Cheater
alg-cheater.description: Use a cheat more than 50 times.

General Custer.name: General Custer
General Custer.description: Lead 30 posse members to their death in the Creature Stage.

Cerberus.name: Cerberus
Cerberus.description: Evolve a creature with three heads in the Creature Stage.

CRG-Slugger.name: Slugger
CRG-Slugger.description: Finish Creature Stage without using legs.

Medic.name: Medic
Medic.description: Heal one of your tribe members back to full health 5x in a single game during the Tribal Stage.

CVG-Conclusion.name: Conclusion
CVG-Conclusion.description: Finish the Civilization stage by launching ICBMS and destroying all other cities.

CVG-FearOfFlying.name: Fear of Flying
CVG-FearOfFlying.description: Complete the Civilization stage without buying any air vehicles.

SPG-Humanity.name: Oh the Humanity!
SPG-Humanity.description: Gained for destroying Earth using a Planet Buster in the Space Stage.

ADV-EpicFail.name: Epic Fail
ADV-EpicFail.description: Fail 50 missions made by other players.

ADV-MadSkills.name: Mad Skills
ADV-MadSkills.description: Earn top ranks in 50 leader boards.

ADV-Maxis Super Fan.name: Maxis Super Fan
ADV-Maxis Super Fan.description: Create 25 adventures using only Maxis made creatures.

ADV-Top Seller.name: Top Seller
ADV-Top Seller.description: Get 1000 of your assets to be used in other people's adventures.

alg-badbaby.name: Bad Baby!
alg-badbaby.description: Have one of your assets banned.
